alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:39AM CDT until March 30 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 26.9 feet. - Forecast...The creek has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning and continue falling to 24.3 feet by Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 26.9 Fri 9 am CDT 26.6 26.2 25.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
